name: Block Hero - Alpha 0.0.1
description:
Block Hero is my very first game! Its not finished and still need polished so enjoy what I have so far.

Controls:

A = Left

D = Right

G = Resets character to level spawn point (if you get stuck or something)

Space bar = Jump

Escape = Pause menu

Also Xbox Controllers are supported but only for gameplay, you have to navigate the menus with a mouse.

Left Stick controls movement

A Button = Jump

Y Button = Resets character to level spawn point (if you get stuck or something)

Start Button = Pause menu
